javadoc: FolderItem represents an individual file contained within a FileSystem and is uniquely identified by a path string.

methods.javadoc: Return The display name for this item.
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Return The display name for this item.

methods.javadoc:
Return the file ID if one has been established or null
@throws IOException thrown if IO or access error occurs
methods.name: getFileID
methods.comment: Return the file ID if one has been established or null

throws.comment: thrown if IO or access error occurs

methods.name: resetFileID
methods.comment:
Assign a new file-ID to this local non-versioned file.
 NOTE: This method is only valid for a local non-versioned file-system.

throws.comment: thrown if IO or access error occurs

methods.name: length
methods.comment:
Returns the length of this domain file.  This size is the minimum disk space
 used for storing this file, but does not account for additional storage space
 used to tracks changes, etc.

throws.comment: thrown if IO or access error occurs

methods.javadoc: Return The content type name for this item.
methods.name: getContentType
methods.comment: Return The content type name for this item.

methods.javadoc: Returns the path of the parent folder.
methods.name: getParentPath
methods.comment: Returns the path of the parent folder.

methods.javadoc:
Return The concatenation of the pathname and the basename
 which can be used to uniquely identify a folder item.
methods.name: getPathName
methods.comment:
Return The concatenation of the pathname and the basename
 which can be used to uniquely identify a folder item.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if item can be overwritten/deleted.
methods.name: isReadOnly
methods.comment: Returns true if item can be overwritten/deleted.

methods.name: setReadOnly
methods.comment: Set the state of the read-only indicator for this non-shared item.

throws.comment:
if an IO error occurs or item is 
 stored on a shared file-system

methods.javadoc:
Returns the version of content type.  Note this is the version of the structure/storage
 for the content type, Not the users version of their data.
methods.name: getContentTypeVersion
methods.comment:
Returns the version of content type.  Note this is the version of the structure/storage
 for the content type, Not the users version of their data.

methods.name: setContentTypeVersion
methods.comment:
Sets the version for the content type. This will change whenever the domain objects
 are upgraded.

params.name: version
params.comment: the new version for the content type.

throws.comment:
if an IO error occurs or item is 
 stored on a shared file-system

methods.javadoc: Return The time that this item was last modified.
methods.name: lastModified
methods.comment: Return The time that this item was last modified.

methods.javadoc: Return the latest/current version.
methods.name: getCurrentVersion
methods.comment: Return the latest/current version.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if this item is a checked-out copy from a versioned file system.
methods.name: isCheckedOut
methods.comment: Returns true if this item is a checked-out copy from a versioned file system.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if this item is a checked-out copy with exclusive access from a versioned file system.
methods.name: isCheckedOutExclusive
methods.comment: Returns true if this item is a checked-out copy with exclusive access from a versioned file system.

methods.javadoc:
Return true if this is a versioned item, else false
@throws IOException thrown if an IO error occurs.
methods.name: isVersioned
methods.comment: Return true if this is a versioned item, else false

throws.comment: thrown if an IO error occurs.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the checkoutId for this file.  A value of -1 indicates 
 a private item.
 NOTE: This method is only valid for a local non-versioned file-system.
@throws IOException if an IO error occurs
methods.name: getCheckoutId
methods.comment:
Returns the checkoutId for this file.  A value of -1 indicates 
 a private item.
 NOTE: This method is only valid for a local non-versioned file-system.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the item version which was checked-out.  A value of -1 indicates 
 a private item. 
 NOTE: This method is only valid for a local non-versioned file-system.
@throws IOException
methods.name: getCheckoutVersion
methods.comment:
Returns the item version which was checked-out.  A value of -1 indicates 
 a private item. 
 NOTE: This method is only valid for a local non-versioned file-system.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the local item version at the time the checkout was
 completed.  A value of -1 indicates a private item.  
 NOTE: This method is only valid for a local non-versioned file-system.
methods.name: getLocalCheckoutVersion
methods.comment:
Returns the local item version at the time the checkout was
 completed.  A value of -1 indicates a private item.  
 NOTE: This method is only valid for a local non-versioned file-system.

methods.name: setCheckout
methods.comment:
Set the checkout data associated with this non-shared file.
 NOTE: This method is only valid for a local non-versioned file-system.

params.name: checkoutVersion
params.comment:
the item version which was checked-out (provided
 by ItemCheckoutStatus).

params.name: localVersion
params.comment:
the local item version at the time the checkout was
 completed.

throws.comment:
if an IO error occurs or item is 
 stored on a shared file-system

methods.name: clearCheckout
methods.comment:
Clears the checkout data associated with this non-shared file.
 NOTE: This method is only valid for a local non-versioned file-system.

methods.name: delete
methods.comment:
Deletes the item or a specific version.  If a specific version 
 is specified, it must either be the oldest or latest (i.e., current).

params.name: version
params.comment:
specific version to be deleted, or -1 to remove
 all versions.

throws.comment:
if an IO error occurs, including the inability 
 to delete a version because this item is checked-out, the user does
 not have permission, or the specified version is not the oldest or
 latest.

methods.name: getVersions
methods.comment:
Returns list of all available versions or null
 if item is not versioned.

throws.comment: thrown if an IO error occurs.

methods.name: checkout
methods.comment: Checkout this folder item.

params.name: projectPath
params.comment: path of project where checkout was made

throws.comment: if an IO error occurs or this item is not versioned

return.comment: checkout status or null if exclusive checkout request failed

methods.name: terminateCheckout
methods.comment:
Terminates a checkout.  The checkout ID becomes invalid, therefore the 
 associated checkout copy should either be removed or converted to a
 private file.

params.name: notify
params.comment: if true item change notification will be sent

throws.comment: if an IO error occurs or this item is not versioned

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this item is versioned and has one or more checkouts.
@throws IOException if an IO error occurs
methods.name: hasCheckouts
methods.comment: Returns true if this item is versioned and has one or more checkouts.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if unsaved file changes can be recovered.
methods.name: canRecover
methods.comment: Returns true if unsaved file changes can be recovered.

methods.name: getCheckout
methods.comment: Get the checkout status which corresponds to the specified checkout ID.

throws.comment: if an IO error occurs or this item is not versioned

return.comment: checkout status or null if checkout ID not found.

methods.name: getCheckouts
methods.comment: Get all current checkouts for this item.

throws.comment: if an IO error occurs or this item is not versioned

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this item is versioned and has a checkin in-progress.
@throws IOException if an IO error occurs
methods.name: isCheckinActive
methods.comment: Returns true if this item is versioned and has a checkin in-progress.

methods.name: updateCheckoutVersion
methods.comment: Update the checkout version associated with this versioned item.

params.name: checkoutId
params.comment: id corresponding to an existing checkout

methods.name: output
methods.comment: Serialize (i.e., pack) this item into the specified outputFile.

params.name: outputFile
params.comment: packed output file to be created

params.name: version
params.comment:
if this item is versioned, specifies the version to be output, otherwise
 -1 should be specified.

methods.javadoc: Returns this instance after refresh or null if item no longer exists
methods.name: refresh
methods.comment: Returns this instance after refresh or null if item no longer exists

name: FolderItem
comment:
FolderItem represents an individual file
 contained within a FileSystem and is uniquely identified 
 by a path string.

fields.javadoc: Underlying file is an unknown/unsupported type.
fields.name: UNKNOWN_FILE_TYPE
fields.comment: Underlying file is an unknown/unsupported type.

fields.javadoc: Underlying file is serialized data file
fields.name: DATAFILE_FILE_TYPE
fields.comment: Underlying file is serialized data file

fields.javadoc: Default checkout ID used when a checkout is not applicable.
fields.name: DEFAULT_CHECKOUT_ID
fields.comment: Default checkout ID used when a checkout is not applicable.

fields.javadoc: Default file version number used to indicate the latest/current version.
fields.name: LATEST_VERSION
fields.comment: Default file version number used to indicate the latest/current version.
